Jennifer Guerrero, Senior Controller NYC x246

I have been in finance and operations management for over 15 years, prior to joining the Green Key team, I was the Controller at GFT.  My past work experience covers a diverse range of industries including advertising, financial services, professional services and manufacturing.  I graduated from Syracuse University, where I studied Accounting and Finance. Fun fact: I’ve travelled to over 22 countries and resided in London for 8 months.  Enjoying GKR so far! 

Katie Radcliffe, Temp OS NYC x689

I have recently moved to NYC from Sydney, Australia, where I gained a Bachelor and Master’s degree in Science, specializing in nutrition. Whilst completing my studies, I began working for Benchmarque, a hospitality and event recruitment agency, where I’ve been for the last 2+ years pursuing a career as a staffing coordinator. I’m a very outgoing person and love meeting new people (hopefully including everyone at Green Key!). I love to travel and am up to my 37th country.

Michelle Garner, IT NYC x133

I have worked as a Technical Recruiter for about a year and a half, I was previously at a staffing firm that was strictly IT focused. I graduated from SUNY Cortland in December 2013 where I attained my Bachelor’s Degree in Communication and was able to continue my dance career during my time there. I recently returned from a three month backpacking trip where I traveled through Australia and 12 countries in Europe. I’m thrilled to join the Green Key team, and I look forward to meeting everyone. 

Maggie Ward, HR Coordinator NYC x175

I graduated from the University of Delaware in 2011 with a degree in Fashion Merchandising. After working in the fashion industry for a little over four years, I’ve decided to switch industries and pursue a new path. In my spare time you can find me hanging out in Hoboken, cooking, shopping, and traveling whenever I can.  I love to make a quick trip back to my hometown down the Jersey Shore to spend time with my new niece and nephew! I’m looking forward to this exciting career change and can’t wait to meet everyone at Green Key!

Andy Devney, Systems and Technology Manager x157

I have been in IT for over seven years. I’ve worked in various helpdesks ranging from universities, hospitals, and in the financial industry.  My most recent position was as a technical support technician for Bloomberg. I have a bachelor’s degree from DeVry University in Networking Communications Management. I grew up in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, moved to Denver for college, and moved to NYC in 2012. Skiing is one of my favorite activities in the winter. I’m excited to learn and progress in my career at Green Key Resources. 

Allie Merkent, Internal Recruiter NYC x136

I recently graduated from West Chester University in May of 2015 with a Bachelor’s in Fine Arts and a minor in Art History. After graduation, I worked as an HR Generalist for Formosa Plastics and became interested in pursuing a career in recruiting.  I am excited to work in a fast-paced work environment and the opportunity to interact with new people every day. I look forward to learning and growing at Green Key and meeting everyone who works here!

Laura Hale, Research Analyst NYC x217

I graduated from Kent State University with Hospitality Management in 2014. 3 months ago I moved to New York in the East Village seeking out employment and found Green Key to be a great fit. I enjoy playing volleyball and joined a league in the city. I also love to travel and hope to visit Europe someday soon. I really am excited about the opportunity that Green Key has given me and look forward to meeting everyone in the next couple of weeks. 

 

LONG ISLAND:

Loren Correi, AF Perm Long Island x417

I went to Stony Brook University. I started my career in Banking and then branched off into Payroll. I am very outgoing and looking forward to the fast paced activity that this job entails. I love to read and listen to music. I am excited to join the  Green Key team and I cannot wait to meet everyone!

Thomas Castelli, AF Perm LI x418

I graduated from SUNY Farmingdale with a B.S. In Business Management in June 2014. I started as an intern at BDO the same month that turned into a full-time position. After passing the CPA exam, I began looking for new positions and met a Green Key recruiter that eventually led to me joining the Accounting and Finance group.

 

CHICAGO:

Felecia Martin, Pharma Chicago x536

I graduated from Purdue in Neurobiology and post-graduation stayed at Purdue working in laboratory research for two years before attending pharmacy school in Denver, Colorado. However, I quickly realized after my first year there that I was no longer interested in a career in medicine. After discontinuing my studies, I began looking into careers where I could transfer the skills I learned from my education into sales, leading me to find this recruiting position at Green Key! Fun facts about me is that I love to travel abroad, go to rock concerts, and play volleyball regularly. I look forward to getting started on my new career and being apart of the Green Key team.

Christine Choy, Pharma Chicago x547

I graduated from Illinois State in 2010 with a B.A. in Communication and Community Health Education. I have worked as a recruiter for a for-profit nursing college for the past four years, for both the MSN and BSN program. In my spare time I enjoy going to concerts, comedy shows and spending time with family and friends. I am excited to join the Chicago team!

 

MASSACHUSETTS:

Jake Milette, Engineering Technology Westford x610

I am a proud resident of the state of NH. I have lived in 5 or 6 different states throughout my life but NH is easily my favorite. You can’t beat the gorgeous mountain vistas and beautiful forest areas. I have worked in the staffing world for about 6 months now, as I previously worked at TechStar Consulting in the Temp Staffing division. Music, technology and the outdoors are my undying passions. I am a musician and play drums, piano, guitar, bass and multiple others. Finding a job like this where I could talk with engineers all day sounded like an incredibly cool opportunity, so naturally I took it and have loved it so far. I am planning on pursuing my Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science from SNHU in the near future.  I am super excited to join Green Key Resources and stoked to eventually meet everybody!

item.title: GKR New York, Bring in your clothes!
item.dc:creator: Marina-White
item.content:encoded:
2015 Clothing Drive in NYC Office ---- We are excited to announce this year the NYC office will be a drop off location for new and gently used business clothes.  

The mission is to collect work clothes for economically disadvantaged New Yorkers so they can make a good impression on their interviews. 

Read More about the organizations below:

Bottomless Closet offers an innovative approach to workforce preparation for disadvantaged New York City women transitioning from unemployment and public assistance to work.     

http://www.bottomlessclosetnyc.org/

Career Gear promoting the economic independence of low-income men by providing financial literacy training, a network of support, professional attire, career development tools, job-readiness and essential life-skills training that help men enter the workforce, stay employed and become role models and mentors

https://careergear.org

 

I’ve attached a PDF of the various clothing qualifications.  Please bring clothes to the office in the upcoming weeks, there will be 2 boxes at reception.

PLEASE ALSO encourage your candidates to do the same. I have attached the logos here if you want to updated your signature.

**There will be 2 clearly marked boxes up by reception until December 31st to collect the clothes. Please make sure to put men’s and women’s clothes in the correct boxes.**

item.title: Green Key continues to grow across the country! Welcome the newest members of the team!
item.dc:creator: Marina-White
item.content:encoded:
NYC:

J.T. Kirk, Accounting/Finance Perm Research x277

I graduated from New Paltz this past December with a B.S. in General Business. While at New Paltz I was on the Baseball team. I’m a big sports fan, I love my Yankees, Rangers and Jets! This is my first job out of college and I am very excited about the opportunity. I look forward to meeting everyone in the next few weeks.

Rebecca Menachem, Healthcare Perm Research x424

I recently graduated from SUNY Oneonta in December 2015. I began my job search immediately after graduation and came across Green Key. I am excited to begin working here and meet new people while I am here. In my free time my passion is cooking, so I love to create new recipes and hope they taste good! I am very excited to start working with GKR and look forward to gaining experience in the recruiting field.

Jackie Pesce, Accounting/Finance x458

I’m extremely excited to be a part of Green Key. Prior to GKR I worked for Macy’s Inc. in their Marketing department for about 4 years. I was interested in recruiting for a while and finally made the change with the opportunity at GKR. I have always been intrigued by the fast-pace environment and the exciting challenges. As a native Floridian, I am a lover of the beach and the sun and most importantly the University of Florida Gators which is where I graduated from in 2011 with a B.S. in Public Relations. I love to cook Italian food and travel as much as I can.

Danielle Chait, Healthcare Temp x463

I have worked in staffing and recruiting for over 10 years. I previously worked at Onward Healthcare/AMN as a senior recruiter and acct. manager. Prior to joining I have staffed travel therapist across the country as well as managed the NY/NJ division of allied. My interests include traveling and music. I am very excited to join the Green Key Resources team and I look forward to meeting everyone.

Tobia St. Germain, Receptionist x100

I am a photographer/graphic artist born and raised in Brooklyn. I graduated with an M.A. in Communication Management, while working as a recruiter for a small boutique firm. After a few years honing my craft I am back in the fast paced world of Recruiting. Come visit me up front, I sit on the 7th floor!!

Adam Siebert, Pharma Perm x456

I graduated from St. Bonaventure University in 2013. I started my career at Conifer Realty then had a stint at an Energy Efficiency company.  I was introduced to recruiting and Green Key by family and friends. I was intrigued by the opportunity and so I decided to make the move to NYC.  I am excited to learn more as I progress and look forward to meeting everyone in the next few weeks. 

Long Island:

Rachael Raffa, Temporary Office Support x425

I graduated from Oswego in 2012 with a B.S. in Childhood Education. I played Varsity Lacrosse for all four years and recreational soccer. I started my career as an Office Manager for a Sales company in Melville. I was introduced to recruiting and Green Key specifically by Jessa and the Long Island team. I enjoy traveling and watching Hockey. I am very excited to be apart of the Green Key Resources Team and look forward to meeting everyone!

Renee Stuto, Temporary Office Support x462

I graduated from John Jay College of Criminal Justice in 2007 with a B.S. in Molecular Biology. Upon graduation, I realized that I could not sit in a lab for the rest of my life and needed to re-create myself.  I always desired a fast paced, challenging work environment.  I started my career at Long Island Business News and eventually migrated to Briarcliffe College where I served as a Senior Recruiter for 6 years. Some of my interests include cooking, concerts, and traveling.  I am excited to start the next chapter of my life with Green Key Resources and pleased to be part of such a talented group of individuals.

Eileen Snyder, Temporary Healthcare x461

I graduated for Northeastern University in 2011 and obtained my MBA-Healthcare in 2014. I had been a practice manager at a psychiatric/medical spa for 4.5 years prior to starting at Green Key. As practice manager I handled the provider staffing and credentialing of the medical director’s off-site ventures. After meeting with Matt, Dan, Jessa and the Healthcare-temp team I was excited to make the move into staffing/recruitment full-time. My interests including sailing, spending summers at the beach, and yoga. I’m also a new mommy and have a 6 month old son, Sawyer.

Orlando, FL:

Cory Bush, Pharma Temp x327

I graduated from University Of Florida with my Bachelors Chemical Engineering in 2009.  I have work experience in several small labs doing work for water and soil testing and some nuclear engineering research.  I have been working in Restaurant Management for the last 6 years.  I am looking forward to learning and diving in head first here at Green Key and the new challenges it will bring!

Ryan Webb, Pharma Temp Recruiter x328

I’m a Cajun boy who was born in St. Louis, grew up in Nashville and graduated from the University of Louisiana at Lafayette. And while explaining my interesting accent might seem like a full-time job, my actual background is in sales and marketing. Most recently I spent the last several years traveling the country in the oil and gas industry before moving to Florida last year. I’m excited for the opportunity to transition my skills into the lucrative world of recruiting, and truly honored to join the team at Green Key. 

Westford, MA:

Eric Dunning – Engineering Technology x616

I have been in the staffing and talent acquisition industry for 10 years. Many of those years I was a recruiter for some well known IT staffing companies like Oxford and Kforce. I then made my way over to Monster.com to build out their first RPO Division that later became Talent Fusion. Here I focused on selling strategic talent acquisition/recruitment solutions to both small and large companies across the US. When I am not dialing a phone or meeting someone for lunch, I am avid hunter and sport enthusiast. Played D3 College football and lacrosse and then continued to play in the semi-pro leagues for 5 years. I am very excited about my new Boston based team and looking forward to get things started.

Rockville, MD:

Emily Gardner, Accounting/Finance Research x513

I graduated with my Associate’s Degree in Baking and Pastry Arts and Bachelor’s Degree in Food Service Management from Johnson & Wales University in Charlotte, NC last February. While in school I concentrated on both Beverage Service & Meeting and Event Management. I discovered I had a passion for sales and was able to obtain experience as a Sales and Marketing Assistant at two respectable foodservice establishments in North Carolina. Having moved to Maryland, I am expanding my career as a Research Analyst (Recruiter in training) within the Accounting and Finance division. I am excited to learn and grow within the Green Key family and am driven to surpass expectations and continue to spoil the Rockville office with home-made baked goods.

item.title: Brooks Brothers Sale - Save the Date!
item.dc:creator: Marina-White
item.content:encoded:
We are having a one-day Brooks Brothers sale on March 10, 2016.  They will be giving us 30% off so please mark your calendars!

Brooks Brothers March 2016

 

 

ONE DAY ONLY – MARCH 10, 2016 

SAVE 30% 

on all full priced purchases online and in Retail stores

when using your Corporate Membership card.

 

*An exclusive offer for enrolled Brooks Brothers Corporate Members. Offer is valid Thursday, March 10, 2016, until 11:59 p.m. EST online and by phone (for shipments to U.S. or Canada only) and until the close of regular business hours in all U.S. and Canadian Brooks Brothers Retail stores.  Not valid in Factory stores.  Visit brooksbrothers.com/stores for store listings.  Please present your non-transferable Brooks Brothers Corporate Membership Card, temporary shopping pass or email confirmation at the time of purchase. 30% discount cannot be combined with your standard Corporate Membership discount or other promotion or discount, and does not apply to sale merchandise.  In order to receive your discount for online purchases, your billing and shipping address must match the address provided when enrolling for a Corporate Membership Card.  Excludes Made to Measure and Special Order clothing purchases, and applies to select watches and select Brooks Brothers shoe styles only.  Discount may not be applied toward taxes, shipping and handling, monogramming and engraving, alterations or personalization.  Not valid on previous purchases or for the purchase of gift cards or charitable items.  If you return some or all merchandise, the dollar value of this promotion will not be refunded or credited to your account.  Void where prohibited by law.  No cash value except where prohibited, then the cash value is 1/100 cent.

 

TO ENROLL FOR YOUR NEW MEMBERSHIP CARD:

  • Organization ID# 11206 and Pin Code# 15985 and enroll at: Membership.BrooksBrothers.com

 

IF YOUR MEMBERSHIP CARD HAS EXPIRED OR IS MISPLACED:

  • Renew online anytime and select #4 at: http://www.brooksbrothers.com/on/demandware.store/Sites-brooksbrothers-Site/default/Cis-Show

 

TO SHOP ONLINE:

  • In order to receive your Corporate Membership discount online, you must create a separate Corporate Online profile, even if you already have an existing Brooks Brothers profile.
  • You must allow 20 minutes after you receive your email confirmation before creating your online Corporate Online profile.
  • Complete the entire form and enter in your 12 digit Membership Number towards the bottom:  http://www.brooksbrothers.com/on/demandware.store/Sites-brooksbrothers-Site/default/Account-StartRegister.
  • Your discount will automatically be applied to your order at the last page of checkout.

 

 

Brooks Brothers Corporate Membership

Toll-Free:  1.866.515.4747, M-F, 9am-5pm, EST

Email: Corporate.Services@BrooksBrothers.com

BrooksBrothers.com/CorporateMembership

item.title: Welcome to our 4 newest NYC team members!
item.dc:creator: randib@greenkeyllc.com
item.content:encoded:
Larry Greenbaum - Accounting/ Finance Temp, Sr Account Manager, NYC x199

I am a SUNY Oneonta graduate with 4 + years of Accounting experience from MTV and HBO.  I have been working as an Accounting & Financial Staffing Specialist with an emphasis on temporary and temp to hire placement for over 25 years across a broad industry mix. I live on Long Island and enjoy spending time with my family.  At this time of year I am looking forward to getting back on my bicycle each weekend for long rides to stay in shape. I am excited to join the GKR team and look forward to continuing to grow with the company.

Kristin Kulas - Research Analyst Temp, NYC x198

I graduated from Fordham University in 2012 and started working for American Eagle Outfitters as a Human Resources Assistant.  As an HR Assistant I developed a love for recruiting and knack for finding the right candidate.  I love to cook and am currently obsessed with quiona and kale! I am excited to get to learn and grow from everyone at Green Key.  

Nicholas Ruccione - Technical Recruiter, NYC x354 

I graduated from Umass Amherst in 2011 with a degree in Communication.  After working with Nationwide Insurance for about a year and a half, I was recruited to be a recruiter with Aerotek.  I recruited contract engineers in the Hartford, Connecticut area for just over a year before coming back to North Jersey where I grew up.  I’m excited to be working for a thriving company in a booming marketplace and industry and sense a lot of potential moving forward.  Outside of work I enjoy the outdoors, golf, and live music.  I look forward to working with everyone and what this experience has to bring. 

Jennifer Estevez – Administrative Assistant, NYC x192 

 I have been working in Healthcare administration for about 10 years. Recently, I worked as the office manager for an orthopaedic surgeon at the Hospital for Special Surgery. I graduated from Berkeley College with a B.B.A in Business administration, concentrating in Healthcare Administration. I wanted a career change and GKR presented me with this great opportunity. I am excited and enthusiastic in being able to be a part of this company and take on a completely different role. I know I will be a great fit and I accept the challenges that come with my new role. I believe that I have made the career move I was seeking and I look forward to learning and growing in my career at GreenKey.  I also look forward to meeting and working with everyone.

item.title: You have probably seen their faces, now read their bios... Welcome to our newest Green Key team members!
item.dc:creator: randib@greenkeyllc.com
item.content:encoded:
Lauren Rush - Accounting/ Finance, NYC x219

I graduated from Temple University in 2010 as an accounting major. I worked for three years at WeiserMazars in their audit department, then went to The Row, a high-end fashion line, for 10 months. Ultimately I decided I didn’t want to stay in accounting the rest of my life, and I couldn’t be more excited to start at Green Key! In my free time I enjoy doing crossfit and just exploring NYC/Hoboken with my friends. I look forward to working with everyone on my team, and meeting everyone in the next few weeks. 

Kristin Finnerty - Accounting/ Finance, NYC x218

I graduated from William Paterson University with a BS in Finance.  My first role was in HR at AI then I switched to the agency side of recruiting for accounting and finance at a boutique recruiting firm.  I live in Hoboken and enjoy spending time on weekends down the shore.  I’m excited to be at GKR and meet everyone.

Erik Solomon - Financial Services, NYC x427

I have been in the financial services industry for the last 18 years.  I started out as a Financial Advisor and then moved into Equity Trading in 2001. By 2007, I opened a proprietary trading firm that specialized in short term trading. The firm also had a division that provided trading education for individuals who wanted to learn the craft of trading. With the industry quickly changing, I made a decision that it was time for a career change. I am excited about this new opportunity to be an executive recruiter at Green Key in the financial services division.

Melissa Sanchez-Lopez - Account Manager, Healthcare Temp, x428

I have worked in staffing and recruiting for over 14 years. I previously worked at RCM Health Care Services as the Supervisor of Rehab and DOE Services, where most of my focus was working with the NYC DOE. After 9 years of handling the NYC DOE contract for RCM – I needed a break and that is when Green Key found me!  I have been married for 9 years and I have 2 young boys that definitely keep me busy and in shape. On my free time (whenever I actually have free time) – I enjoy swimming and dancing. I am very excited to have finally join the Green Key Resources team and I look forward to meeting everyone.

Kim York – Pharma, NYC x429

I have worked as both an Account Manager and a Recruiter in the pharmaceutical industry for 16 years.  I have a Bachelor’s degree from the University of Pittsburgh and also studied towards an MBA at Corpus Christi State University and Xavier University. I worked for The Cambridge Group Ltd for over 12 years before it was sold to On Assignment out of CA.  4 years later I am happy to be back in the privately held environment!  I have raised 3 children to be happy and productive adults – proud to say that my oldest child works at Green Key in the OS and HR area- Katelyn. I grew up in Pittsburgh and am a fan of the Steelers, Pirates and Penguins- it’s a sports town!  I live in Wilton CT and have a yellow lab and a chocolate lab and a cat named Nigel.  I hope to someday live by the beach but until then, I am just going to enjoy stressing out about every deal because I love what I do for a living and coming to Green Key has reignited that enthusiasm. 

Susanne Besenbruch - Account Manager, MD x430

Susi comes to Green key with over 22 years experience in the Staffing & Recruiting Industry.  She enjoys the challenge of breaking down doors, meeting with new companies and building long-term partnerships.  Susi has been providing customized staffing solutions in the areas of Office Professionals, Accounting & Finance, Call Center, Human Resources & Marketing. 6 Time Performance Forum Winner and 1 Time Circle of Excellence Winner  and 2 Time Presidents Cup Winner for Outstanding Sales and Account Growth.Her core strengths, founded by Strengths Finder, are: Achiever, Competition, Positivity, Empathy, and Maximizer. Susi is a big San Diego Chargers fan (San Diego native) and Boston Red Sox fan!

Patrick Lupfer - Research AF/FS, NYC x433

I graduated from Pace University in 2013 after studying Business Management and playing football there for all 4 years. I am from Long Island and have a huge passion for sports. With that being said I started my career working for the New York Islanders in ticket sales and soon realized that I wanted something a little more competitive and fast paced. I got introduced to Green Key from my cousin who knows a couple people over here and after interviewing I realized this is the exact type of work environment I am looking for. Recruiting will be a new challenge but I am very excited to start my new career.

Lisette Boniche – Administrative Assistant, x192

After earning my Associates degree at Adelphi University, I transferred to Montclair State University where I graduated with a Bachelors in Business Administration/ Management and Economics minor.  I have over seven years administrative experience having worked both in the public and private sectors at Montclair State University and Municipal Inspection Corporation, respectively.  I have also dabbled in sales having worked in the retail industry at Victoria’s Secret and The Children’s Place.  Aside from my love of business and the fast paced environment of New York City, I have passion for family, dance, design and travel.  Thank you, Green Key, for welcoming me into the firm; I am excited and eager to learn and grow here with you.

Tyler Wildt - Temp Research, Chicago x434

I am a recent Indiana University graduate with a degree in Spanish, Political Science (minor), and International Studies (minor).  My 2 years at LensCrafters allowed me to discover my love of sales and helped develop the necessary skills to be a successful recruiter for my fraternity.  Outside of work I like to golf, cook, and build computers.  I am eager to continue my career at Green Key and look forward to meeting everyone!

Anthony Agosto Jr.– Payroll/Billing Coordinator, NYC x394

Shortly after business school, I worked as a Payroll/Billing Coordinator for RCM Healthcare Services, where I met fellow GKR employee Nolan Hernandez.  I worked there for over a year and a half. I am very excited to be working for Green Key Resources and I would like thank Nolan Hernandez for recruiting me. I am excited to be working with him again and to grow with this company. I know it will be a challenging and rewarding experience. I am a very simple and easy going guy who likes to have fun and make people laugh. I hope that I will be a valuable asset to this company and I look forward to working with everyone.

Nielsy Trociuk - Payroll/Billing Coordinator, NYC x162

I graduated from Kingsborough College in 2011 with a degree in Office Administration and Technology. After graduation, I started my career as a receptionist at a healthcare staffing agency. Because of my motivation, dedication, knowledge, and willingness to learn, I was promoted to payroll coordinator. Now 3 years later, I am here at Green Key Resources. During my spare time, I like to work out, hang out with friends, cook, travel, and listen to music.  I am very happy to be here and my first few weeks have been great. I look forward to meeting everyone.

ONE DAY ONLY – MAY 21st, 2014 

SAVE 30%

on all regularly priced purchases, both in-store and online,

when using your Corporate Membership card.

 

 

TO ENROLL FOR YOUR NEW MEMBERSHIP CARD:

  • Please use our unique Organization ID#11206 and Pin Code#15985.

 

IF YOUR MEMBERSHIP CARD HAS EXPIRED OR IS MISPLACED:

  • Renew online anytime at www.brooksbrothers.com/cis/corprenewal.tem.

 

TO SHOP ONLINE:

  • In order to receive your Corporate Membership discount online, you must create a separate Corporate Member profile, even if you already have an existing Brooks Brothers profile.

Wendy Warner, Tami Savarick, Dan Katz, Jessa Niemeyer and Bonnie Katz looking good at the 23rd annual SHRM conference in Woodbury Long Island.

Thank you for representing Green Key!

item.title: Babies, Engagements, Weddings, Marathons and more.....Cheers and Best Wishes to our GKR family!
item.dc:creator: randib@greenkeyllc.com
item.content:encoded:
Here at Green Key, as we approach our 10 year anniversary, we like to celebrate more than our work accolades. Especially when the celebrating is rooted in the office. So, an initial congratulations is in store for 2 special Green Key romances. Billy Merva (AF NYC) recently popped the question to Antonia Smith (FS NYC), she said yes as did Kate Feely (HC Temp NYC) when Matt Carbon (FS NYC) asked her several months ago, they are set to get married this summer. Congrats all (both are pictured above).

In other fun GKR news, Sean Wiener (AF NYC, pictured above with his fiancé) and Rosa Goldstein (AF Temp NYC) have also recently accepted proposals to their significant others. This has all been going on while Meredith Brod (HC Temp NYC) was planning her wedding to Jake and Mike Meluzio (Accounting) was marrying his wife. Congrats to you all!

We’ve welcomed a new GKR baby, Jodi Perlmutter’s (Pharma NYC) adorable Lucas was born 1 month ago, his little picture is featured here as well. And to Krista Nehring (Pharma FLA) and Chelsea Calabrese (Pharma FLA) who are both expecting little ones this fall, Good Luck!!

Congratulations to Shannon Tighe (Temp NYC) and James Whitehead (AF NYC) who both completed their first half marathons last month at the Brooklyn Half. Way to go!

As we all work hard here at GKR we are thankfully for the wonderful people who make coming to work every day that much better!  Have a great day and share your stories with us!

item.title: Welcome to the newest members of the Green Key Team all over the country!
item.dc:creator: randib@greenkeyllc.com
item.content:encoded:
Rebecca Figueroa - Temp Recruiter, FL x400

I am a Bilingual recruiter with over 8 years of  staffing industry experience in the areas of Administrative, Call Center, Sales and General Labor positions. I always enjoy challenges, and like learning new things. I am excited about this wonderful opportunity and being part of the Green Key Resources team. My favorite vacation spot is Cancun Mexico, cooking is my passion and I love spending time with my family. 

Christina Cintron - Pharma Temp, FL x399

I was born and raised in New York City and graduated from New York University in 2001 with a Bachelors Degree in Communications. I began my recruiting career here in Orlando FL in 2009. I started out specializing in the placement of clinical and non clinical professionals within local healthcare organizations in South Florida and eventually nationwide.  I instantly fell in love with my new career and am happy to say that I hold over 5 years of progressive Healthcare Staffing experience to include perm, contract, temp to perm, and per diem recruiting; sales; marketing, compliance, and training. After hours, I am “HONEY” to my husband Harold and  “MOM” to 2 amazing little boys – Evan (9) and Ian (2) - as well as 2 step daughters – Aime (14) and Alicia (12). I love cooking, music, salsa dancing, horror movies, and going on adventures with my family.  I am so glad to be part of the Green Key Family and look forward to meeting everyone in person

Erika Winchester - Recruiter, MD x439

I am originally from Kansas City, Missouri and I attended college in San Diego, California.  I graduated from California State University San Marcos in 2010 with a Bachelor’s degree in Communication.  After graduation I moved back home to Kansas City and worked on the sales side of the mortgage industry for 3.5 years.  This past April I moved to Florida to be with my boyfriend who is a corpsman in the Navy.  While in Florida I took a temporary job as a recruiter with a staffing agency there and I LOVED IT!  It was something I had never thought of doing, but I think it has turned out to be just the perfect job for me.  The Navy has stationed my boyfriend at Walter Reed hospital in Bethesda, MD for the next 4 years.  I look forward to growing with Green Key during my time here!

Sean Ames – IT, Long Island x440

I have been a contingency, direct hire Recruiter for 10 years. My core focus over the last 5 years was IT Healthcare while working for a CT based firm. I graduated Siena College in Albany, NY in 2002 where I played soccer and rugby. I am originally from Mahopac, NY, but permanently relocated to East Northport, NY with my family 3 years ago. I enjoy being a Recruiter because it is a great mix of working independently, but still being part of a team. Also no day is ever the same. I enjoy skiing and traveling when I have the time. I am excited to join Green Key Resources, and look forward to meeting everyone.

Stuart Leifer – Accounting Finance, NYC x200

I graduated from Rider University in 2010 with an undergraduate degree in accounting. I have been at Morgan Stanley the past two years as a finance associate. I was originally a candidate of Greenkey and decided that I wanted to give recruiting a shot. An interest of mine is basketball (watching and playing). A fun fact about me is I have a fraternal twin.

Marina White - Research Analyst, NYC x166

I recently graduated from Boston College with a BA in Communications and Psychology.  During college I was very involved in volunteer groups and had summer internships in New York City.  I love traveling, last year I studied abroad in Spain for 5 months and just got back from Peru visiting Machu Picchu. I’m very excited to meet everyone and be a part of the Green Key Resources team.

Brooke Raphalian - Research Analyst, NYC x273

I am a recent graduate of Emory University in Atlanta, where I obtained my Sociology degree. I am from Short Hills, NJ and am very happy to be back in the northeast. In my spare time, I enjoy trying new restaurants, traveling and cycling. I am very excited to be a part of the Green Key team, and I look forward to meeting everyone in the coming weeks.
